QueryDefinition.Query: With ch AS( SELECT person_id from {sc}.chunk_person order by person_id limit {pagesize} offset {pagesize*page} ) SELECT DISTINCT a.patid, deathdate, toreason, CASE WHEN toreason = 1 and deathdate is not null and deathdate > '1987-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DIED from ch join {sc}.patient as a on ch.person_id = a.patid where deathdate is not null order by a.patid
